html:
11.27.20  11:22 am   Bill, are your next song/video in the key of G major?

     yes

      Thanks in advice, you are the greatest one-man-band ever, with your inspired melodies, complex harmonies and state-of-the-art arrangements

11.27.20  10:17 am   Do you ever overwork yourself to the point of having an effect on your health?

     i've done it

     If so, how do you deal with that?

      crash entirely

11.27.20  8:55 am   What is your favorite song that you created

      i would prefer to make a new one to be my favorite

11.27.20  7:42 am   I want to get into music theory but I don't know where to start, any tips?

      what made you want this? see if you can trace back to the moment that made you start thinking about this. that would be where you should start. the reason i am suggesting this is, what i have found is, what people refer to as 'music theory' usually means a different thing within each person's unique imagination

11.27.20  6:56 am   I wonder why you answer questions with some words in ALL CAPS? it's sort of funny.

      i would prefer something more subtle, such as bold, but i'm going for the most future proof mode and sticking entirely with fontless plaintext. so capitals seems to be the most reliable form of emboldenment

11.27.20  6:39 am   do you normally give straight answers

      i give very wavy answers

11.27.20  5:36 am   Is making music hard?

      despite anyone's best efforts, no

11.27.20  4:52 am   Do you control time and space?

      space, not time. and it's only a relatively very small amount of space

11.27.20  4:45 am   Is your Next video going to come out soon?

      yes

11.27.20  3:20 am   how did you predict this year in just did a bad thing

      i use the simpsons method

11.27.20  2:40 am   How can I become wise like you? 

      become wise like you

11.27.20  2:36 am   what's a good new years resolution 

      to document your thoughts on january 1

11.27.20  1:47 am   are u making a long video

      i am making a normal sized video, to go with a song

11.27.20  1:29 am   What opinion would you give based on your own music?

      i'm doing my best

11.27.20  1:20 am   Will you run for president?

      i doubt it

11.27.20  1:18 am   teach me your wisdoms mr. wurtz

      try this: get a blank piece of paper and a pencil, and put 1 dot somewhere on the paper. really try to outsmart the audience with your placement location

11.27.20  1:14 am   What inspired your sound in music? 

      just trying to get by

11.27.20  1:13 am   How you doing cool songs guy?

      pretty good

11.27.20  1:02 am   Where did all the good times go?

      all around you, right now. that's where they went

11.27.20  12:54 am   How do I not let my pride consume me?

      you'll have to consume it first. it's a race

11.27.20  12:11 am   what do you want for christmas?

      maybe some ponys

11.26.20  11:29 pm   Ever considered learning a new language?

      yes, or more

11.26.20  11:04 pm   do your songs have meaning?

      do you

11.26.20  10:43 pm   Why is doing things so hard? 

      to allow you to get stronger

11.26.20  9:28 pm   thought of Christmas

      i have 2 thoughts.
         1: how could something so lovely be so terrible
         2: how could something terrible be so lovely

11.26.20  8:33 pm   how do you feel about truth

      seems legit

11.26.20  7:35 pm   Did you really carry bricks down a brick road into a brick house?

      no, that was a bit of forced perspective

11.26.20  6:58 pm   have you gotten a better car since "cool facts about bill wurtz" or is your car still bad?

      i got a different bad one

11.26.20  5:38 pm   how much money is the sun worth?

      all of it

11.26.20  4:57 pm   What are you thankful for?

      time and space

11.26.20  3:09 pm   thoughts on coldplay

      surprisingly warm

11.26.20  2:47 pm   should thursdays be abolished 

      no

11.26.20  2:26 pm   Do you have a tutorial on life?

      one would never be enough. it keeps changing

11.26.20  2:12 pm   (In California chorus person here) Thanks! I've got the bassline down with my left hand, so here's what I have for the right hand chords:

Bb Bbm Bbsus4 Bb
Bb Bbsus2sus4 Bbm7 Cm7
Bb Fm7 Ebm Eb
Eb? Bbmaj7sus4? and then the last 3 no clue

Hope that made sense. I know the bass changes the chord names but that would be over complicated to write out lol, since I'm confident in it. Thank you again!

      oh look what i found. this is apparently from 2.5 years before the version you know was recorded, so, no guarantees

11.26.20  1:41 pm   Do you like the songs that you made for your videos?

      i always try to make them as good as i can. so in that case i either failed or succeeded, which i don't always admit to myself

11.26.20  1:23 pm   how do you make your videos

      we'll see

11.26.20  1:18 pm   why is my music bad

      you might be the chosen one

11.26.20  12:30 pm   Was "Might Quit" your way of saying that you're quitting?

      not even close

11.26.20  10:55 am   What did Damien Maymdien Skip on the program notes?

      THE PLOT

11.26.20  9:26 am   What's the name of your cat the one where you sold the house by the bay to him?

      that might have been a fake cat, but that story wasn't about me

11.26.20  8:51 am   any wise words about chairs

      would make a cool font

11.26.20  7:56 am   opinion on chord-scales?

      fake

11.26.20  7:14 am   Do you have aby song in phrigian

      if there are b2's, i'm going to use at least some natural 3's. or else, it's just going to end up in the relative minor key, up a 4th. so, disqualify that as you wish

11.26.20  6:56 am   What do you think of tomatoes? 

      they are not as good as they could be

11.26.20  5:02 am   Do you double track your vocals

     yes

      or do you add a kind of phasing effect?

     no

11.26.20  4:22 am   What's the ultimate pizza topic that's uncommon but not heretical?

      rice

11.26.20  3:44 am   what is the one true date format

      a binary number, of seconds elapsed since jan 1 1970

11.26.20  2:25 am   What's your best song in your opinion?

     how about a new one

     Mine is Outside because outside is cool

11.26.20  1:16 am   Do you find immense joy and splendor in Christmas lights like i do?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

11.26.20  12:42 am   my teacher wants me to write a story about an event that has happened in my life, but nothing interesting has happened in my life yet. any advice?

      write it about something you wish would happen
